   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(openssl_client_cert_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_group/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2
   36:         ]).
   37: 
   38: %% Test cases
   39: -export([no_auth/0,
   40:          no_auth/1,
   41:          auth/0,
   42:          auth/1,
   43:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   44:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   45:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   46:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
   47:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/0,
   48:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/1,
   49:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/0,
   50:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/1,
   51:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/0,
   52:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/1,
   53:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/0,
   54:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/1,
   55:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/0,
   56:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/1,
   57:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/0,
   58:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/1,
   59:          hello_retry_request/0,
   60:          hello_retry_request/1,
   61:          custom_groups/0,
   62:          custom_groups/1,
   63:          hello_retry_client_auth/0,
   64:          hello_retry_client_auth/1,
   65:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   66:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   67:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   68:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1
   69:         ]).
   70: 
   71: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   73: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: all() ->
   75:     [
   76:      {group,  openssl_client}
   77:     ].
   78: 
   79: groups() ->
   80:     [
   81:      {openssl_client, [], protocol_groups()},
   82:      {'tlsv1.3', [], transport_group()},
   83:      {transport_socket, [], tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   84:      {'tlsv1.2', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ++ [{group, ecdsa}, {group, rsa_pss_rsae}, {group, rsa_pss_pss}]},
   85:      {'tlsv1.1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   86:      {'tlsv1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   87:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ++ [{group, ecdsa}]},
   88:      {'dtlsv1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   89:      {rsa, [parallel], all_version_tests()},
   90:      {ecdsa, [parallel], all_version_tests()},
   91:      {dsa, [parallel], all_version_tests()},
   92:      {rsa_1_3, [parallel],
   93:       all_version_tests() ++
   94:           tls_1_3_tests() ++
   95:           [unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
   96:            unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth]},
   97:      {rsa_pss_rsae, [parallel], all_version_tests()},
   98:      {rsa_pss_pss, [parallel], all_version_tests()},
   99:      {rsa_pss_rsae_1_3, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
  100:      {rsa_pss_pss_1_3, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
  101:      {ecdsa_1_3, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
  102:      {eddsa_1_3, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()}
  103:     ].
  104: 
  105: protocol_groups() ->
  106:     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of
  107:         true ->
  108:             [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  109:              {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  110:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  111:              {group, 'tlsv1'},
  112:              {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  113:              {group, 'dtlsv1'}];
  114:         false ->
  115:             [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  116:              {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  117:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  118:              {group, 'tlsv1'}
  119:             ]
  120:      end.
  121: 
  122: pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  123:     [{group, rsa},
  124:      {group, dsa}].
  125: 
  126: transport_group() ->
  127:     [{group, transport_socket}].
  128: 
  129: tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  130:     [{group, rsa_1_3},
  131:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae_1_3},
  132:      {group, rsa_pss_pss_1_3},
  133:      {group, ecdsa_1_3},
  134:      {group, eddsa_1_3}
  135:     ].
  136: 
  137: tls_1_3_tests() ->
  138:     [
  139:      hello_retry_request,
  140:      custom_groups,
  141:      hello_retry_client_auth,
  142:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  143:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected
  144:     ].
  145: 
  146: all_version_tests() ->
  147:     [
  148:      no_auth,
  149:      auth,
  150:      client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  151:      client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  152:      client_auth_use_partial_chain,
  153:      client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain,
  154:      client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail,
  155:      missing_root_cert_no_auth
  156:     ].
  157: 
  158: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  159:     Config = ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
  160:     case ssl_test_lib:working_openssl_client(Config) of
  161:         true -> Config;
  162:         false -> throw({skip, "Broken OpenSSL s_client"})
  163:     end.
  164: 
  165: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  166:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
  167: 
  168: init_per_group(openssl_client, Config) ->
  169:     [{client_type, openssl}, {server_type, erlang} | Config];
  170: 
  171: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == rsa;
  172:                                     Group == rsa_1_3 ->
  173:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  174:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  175:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  176:     %% Make sure _rsa* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  177:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  178:     Ciphers = ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(dhe_rsa) ->
  179:                                                   true;
  180:                                              (ecdhe_rsa) ->
  181:                                                   true;
  182:                                              (_) ->
  183:                                                   false
  184:                                           end, Version),
  185:     case Ciphers of
  186:         [_|_] ->
  187:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa} |
  188:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  189:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts] end},
  190:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  191:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  192:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  193:         [] ->
  194:             {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  195:     end;
  196: init_per_group(Alg, Config) when
  197:       Alg == rsa_pss_rsae;
  198:       Alg == rsa_pss_pss;
  199:       Alg == rsa_pss_rsae_1_3;
  200:       Alg == rsa_pss_pss_1_3 ->
  201:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  202:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  203:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  204: 
  205:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts)
  206:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts)
  207:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts)
  208:         andalso ssl_test_lib:is_sane_oppenssl_pss(rsa_alg(Alg))
  209:     of
  210:         true ->
  211:             #{client_config := COpts,
  212:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  213:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa_alg(Alg)} |
  214:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  215:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> openssl_sig_algs(rsa_alg(Alg)) ++ COpts end},
  216:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++ SOpts end} |
  217:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  218:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  219:         false ->
  220:             {skip, "Missing crypto or OpenSSL support"}
  221:     end;
  222: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == ecdsa;
  223:                                     Group == ecdsa_1_3 ->
  224:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  225:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse
  226:                                              lists:member(dh, PKAlg))
  227:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:openssl_ecdsa_suites() =/= [])
  228:     of
  229:         true ->
  230:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  231:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  232:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  233:             %% Make sure ecdh* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  234:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  235:             Ciphers =  ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(ecdh_ecdsa) ->
  236:                                                            true;
  237:                                                       (ecdhe_ecdsa) ->
  238:                                                            true;
  239:                                                       (_) ->
  240:                                                            false
  241:                                                    end, Version),
  242:             case Ciphers of
  243:                 [_|_] ->
  244:                     [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  245:                      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  246:                                   [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts] end},
  247:                                    {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  248:                                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  249:                                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  250:                                  )];
  251:                         [] ->
  252:                     {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  253:             end;
  254:         false ->
  255:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  256:     end;
  257: init_per_group(eddsa_1_3, Config0) ->
  258:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  259:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0),
  260:     case lists:member(eddsa, PKAlg) andalso
  261:         (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) andalso
  262:          lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg)) of
  263:         true ->
  264:             Conf = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  265:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  266:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
  267:                                                %% OpenSSL does currently not support EDDSA private key files
  268:                                                client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
  269:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
  270:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()}}),
  271:             [{server_config, SOpts},
  272:              {client_config, COpts}] = x509_test:gen_pem_config_files(Conf, filename:join(PrivDir,
  273:                                                                                           "client_ecdsa_missing_eddsa"),
  274:                                                                       filename:join(PrivDir, "server_eddsa")),
  275: 
  276:             [{cert_key_alg, eddsa} |
  277:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  278:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  279:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  280:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  281:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config0))]
  282:                          )];
  283:         false ->
  284:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  285:     end;
  286: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == dsa ->
  287:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  288:     NVersion = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  289:     SigAlgs = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(dsa, NVersion),
  290:     case lists:member(dss, PKAlg) andalso lists:member(dh, PKAlg)
  291:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:openssl_dsa_suites() =/= [])
  292:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:check_sane_openssl_dsa(Config0))
  293:     of
  294:         true ->
  295:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_dsa_cert(Config0),
  296:             COpts = SigAlgs ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_dsa_opts, Config),
  297:             SOpts = SigAlgs ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_dsa_opts, Config),
  298:             %% Make sure dhe_dss* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  299:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  300:             Ciphers =  ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(dh_dss) ->
  301:                                                            true;
  302:                                                       (dhe_dss) ->
  303:                                                            true;
  304:                                                       (_) ->
  305:                                                            false
  306:                                                    end, Version),
  307:             case Ciphers of
  308:                 [_|_] ->
  309:                     [{cert_key_alg, dsa} |
  310:                      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  311:                                   [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts] end},
  312:                                    {server_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | SOpts] end} |
  313:                                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  314:                                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  315:                 [] ->
  316:                     {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  317:             end;
  318:         false ->
  319:             {skip, "Missing DSS crypto support"}
  320:     end;
  321: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  322:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config).
  323: 
  324: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  325:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  326: 
  327: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) when
  328:       TestCase == client_auth_empty_cert_accepted;
  329:       TestCase == client_auth_empty_cert_rejected ->
  330:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  331: 
  332:     case Version of
  333:         sslv3 ->
  334:             %% Openssl client sends "No Certificate Reserved" warning ALERT
  335:             %% instead of sending EMPTY cert message in SSL-3.0 so empty cert test are not
  336:             %% relevant
  337:             {skip, openssl_behaves_differently};
  338:         _ ->
  339:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  340:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  341:             Config
  342:     end;
  343: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  344:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  345:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  346:     Config.
  347: 
  348: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  349:     Config.
  350: 
  351: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  352: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  353: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  354: 
  355: no_auth() ->
  356:      ssl_cert_tests:no_auth().
  357: 
  358: no_auth(Config) ->
  359:       ssl_cert_tests:no_auth(Config).
  360: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  361: auth() ->
  362:     ssl_cert_tests:auth().
  363: auth(Config) ->
  364:     ssl_cert_tests:auth(Config).
  365: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  366: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  367:      ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().
  368: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
  369:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config).
  370: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  371: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
  372:       ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected().
  373: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
  374:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config).
  375: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  376: %%  Have to use partial chain functionality on side running Erlang (we are not testing OpenSSL features)
  377: client_auth_use_partial_chain() ->
  378:     [{doc, "Server does not trust an intermediat CA and fails the connetion as ROOT has expired"}].
  379: client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  380:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  381:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  382:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  383:     Alg = proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  384:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  385:     Ciphers = appropriate_ciphers(Group, Version),
  386: 
  387:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  388:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  389:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(Alg,
  390:                                                                         [{client_chain,
  391:                                                                           [[{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
  392:                                                                                         {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
  393:                                                                            [],
  394:                                                                            []
  395:                                                                           ]},
  396:                                                                          {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}],
  397:                                                                         Config, "use_partial_chain"),
  398:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  399:     CaCertsFile = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ClientOpts),
  400:     ClientCACerts = [DerCA  ||  {'Certificate', DerCA, _} <- ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CaCertsFile)],
  401:     [_, IntermidiateCA, _] = ClientCACerts,
  402:     PartialChain =  fun(CertChain) ->
  403: 			    case lists:member(IntermidiateCA, CertChain) of
  404: 				true ->
  405: 				    {trusted_ca, IntermidiateCA};
  406: 				false ->
  407: 				    unknown_ca
  408: 			    end
  409: 		    end,
  410:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {partial_chain, PartialChain} |
  411:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts0], Config)],
  412:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  413: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  414: %%  Have to use partial chain functionality on side running Erlang (we are not testing OpenSSL features)
  415: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain() ->
  416:    ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain().
  417: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  418:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  419:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  420:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  421:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  422:     Alg = proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  423:     Ciphers = appropriate_ciphers(Group, Version),
  424: 
  425:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  426:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  427:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(Alg,
  428:                                                                         [{client_chain,
  429:                                                                           [[{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
  430:                                                                                         {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
  431:                                                                            [],
  432:                                                                            []
  433:                                                                           ]},
  434:                                                                          {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}], Config, "do_not_use_partial_chain"),
  435:     PartialChain =  fun(_CertChain) ->
  436: 			    unknown_ca
  437: 		    end,
  438:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  439:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {partial_chain, PartialChain} |
  440:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server,  [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts0], Config)],
  441:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_expired).
  442: 
  443: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  444: %%  Have to use partial chain functionality on side running Erlang (we are not testing OpenSSL features)
  445: client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail() ->
  446:    ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail().
  447: client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  448:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  449:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  450:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  451:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  452:     Alg = proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  453:     Ciphers = appropriate_ciphers(Group, Version),
  454: 
  455:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  456:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  457:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(Alg,
  458:                                                                         [{client_chain,
  459:                                                                           [[{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
  460:                                                                                         {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
  461:                                                                            [],
  462:                                                                            []
  463:                                                                           ]},
  464:                                                                          {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}], Config, "partial_chain_fun_fail"),
  465:     PartialChain = fun(_CertChain) ->
  466:                            error(crash_on_purpose)
  467:                    end,
  468:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  469:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {partial_chain, PartialChain} |
  470:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server,  [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts0], Config)],
  471:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_expired).
  472: 
  473: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  474: missing_root_cert_no_auth() ->
  475:    ssl_cert_tests:missing_root_cert_no_auth().
  476: missing_root_cert_no_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  477:     ssl_cert_tests:missing_root_cert_no_auth(Config).
  478: 
  479: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  480: %% TLS 1.3 Test Cases ------------------------------------------------
  481: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  482: hello_retry_request() ->
  483:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_request().
  484: hello_retry_request(Config) ->
  485:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_request(Config).
  486: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  487: custom_groups() ->
  488:  ssl_cert_tests:custom_groups().
  489: custom_groups(Config) ->
  490:   ssl_cert_tests:custom_groups(Config).
  491: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth() ->
  492:  ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth().
  493: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config) ->
  494:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config).
  495: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth() ->
  496:  ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth().
  497: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config) ->
  498:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config).
  499: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  500: hello_retry_client_auth() ->
  501:  ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth().
  502: hello_retry_client_auth(Config) ->
  503:   ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth(Config).
  504: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  505: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  506:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().
  507: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
  508:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config).
  509: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  510: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
  511:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected().
  512: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
  513:    ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config).
  514: 
  515: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_rsae_1_3) ->
  516:     rsa_pss_rsae;
  517: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_pss_1_3) ->
  518:     rsa_pss_pss;
  519: rsa_alg(Atom) ->
  520:     Atom.
  521: 
  522: openssl_sig_algs(rsa_pss_pss) ->
  523:     [{sigalgs, "rsa_pss_pss_sha256"}];
  524: openssl_sig_algs(rsa_pss_rsae) ->
  525:     [{sigalgs,"rsa_pss_rsae_sha256"}];
  526: openssl_sig_algs(rsa_pss_pss_1_3) ->
  527:     [{sigalgs, "rsa_pss_rsae_sha512:rsa_pss_rsae_sha384:rsa_pss_pss_sha256"}];
  528: openssl_sig_algs(rsa_pss_rsae_1_3) ->
  529:     [{sigalgs,"rsa_pss_rsae_sha512:rsa_pss_rsae_sha384:rsa_pss_rsae_sha256"}].
  530: 
  531: appropriate_ciphers(dsa, Version) ->
  532:     ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version);
  533: appropriate_ciphers(_, Version) ->
  534:     ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version).
